Reviews.Title: Decent Smartphone
Reviews.Author: M. Porter
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a fairly priced cellphone and settled on this one.  I really like Samsung but I couldn't afford the Galaxy SIII so I got this one.  This phone has the same menu options and apps as the S-series phones but it doesn't have near as much memory as the newer phones do.  You won't be able to download a lot of songs or apps.  That's my only complaint about the phone.  It has FM radio, Google, Internet, YouTube, texting, camera, e-mail, etc.  It's a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Compared to my old phone, this is better
Reviews.Author: jayem
Reviews.Content: I have been using my old sliding phone (Nokia E66) for 3 years till it broke recently, so I had to look for a new one. Bought this Samsung Galaxy Ace and was excited to use it. When I got it, I enjoyed its features... For sure it was better than my previous phone, no doubt about it. HOWEVER, the internal memory is way too small. I had to uninstall some applications coz the memory got full. Then, the RAM also was limited. Some programs were running in the background when I'm not even using it. I tried closing the program, but it would run again. Then recently, it shut down by itself while I was at work. It was on my desk for 30 mins since I've last used it, and it was on screensaver mode. when I tried unlocking it, it wouldn't budge.. Tried turning it on or unlocking it to no avail. I took out the battery, put it back on then finally, it was able to turn on. The issue never reoccurred.Update: Its been almost a year since I've had this phone, when I use my external memory card, it would say "unexpectedly remove" even though I didn't take it out. The external memory card slot is probably loose thus effecting the programs. When I play music and skip some songs, it would hang then say "unsupported format"... After a 10-15 mins of shutting down the music program, it would work again properly. Because of this issue, I don't save programs/application to my memory card.

Reviews.Title: NO PARECE SER ORIGINAL (NOT APPEAR TO BE ORIGINAL)
Reviews.Author: lucio J. gonzalez U
Reviews.Content: LA CAJA DEL PRODUCTO NO ES LA ORIGINAL DEL GALAXY PARECE DE TELEFONO CHINO ADEMAS NO TRAJO LOS AUDIFONOS Y NI EL MANUAL Y LA BATERIA NO DICE SAMSUNG POR NINGUN LADO.PRODUCT BOX IS NOT THE ORIGINAL CHINESE PHONE GALAXY ALSO SEEMS NOT BROUGHT THE HEADPHONES AND NEITHER THE MANUAL SAYS NO BATTERY SAMSUNG FOR ANY SIDE.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Elixana Melchor
Reviews.Content: The product is working in a excellent way so far,and the shipment was on time. I would recommend this product to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Celular Saumsumg
Reviews.Author: Luis Arrieta
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto y excelente atencion, hasta lo momento los felicito, el equipo es perfecto y mi hija esta muy feliz

Reviews.Title: Great ,
Reviews.Author: Katikla
Reviews.Content: I got this one for my mom.. the only thing I didnt like is that doesn't came with sd Card... so you should get one. But is really easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Hernan Sanchez "Ernie"
Reviews.Content: This is a beatiful phone, very interesting, I am very very happy with them, so I recommended very much for people

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy  Ace
Reviews.Author: Savy Florida Buyer "Savy Florida Buyer"
Reviews.Content: Loving this Samsung Galaxy. But serious users of smart phones will be disappointed with limitation  on memory for additional Android  apps and just rear camera. It serves all my needs with Consumer Cellular.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: Geovanna
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly in USA and in Costa Rica. The size is great and the price is very affordable. Love it

Reviews.Title: Good phone for smartphone basics
Reviews.Author: BK004
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother. It was her first smartphone and she loves it. It's pretty basic for a smartphone but fairly easy to use. It is of a smaller size so you can fit it comfortably in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Thanks to Amazon on the excelent ,and prompt services.
Reviews.Author: alvin  o carter
Reviews.Content: I like this phone it met my expectation for it's size , and it's good for some one who don't need a lot of GB,

Reviews.Title: Faulty Product
Reviews.Author: Yorneliz J. Duran C
Reviews.Content: This product was purchased in July for gift santa claus for my children, turns itself off, has problem with the sotware and when you send the sevice technical, cominican me being reassembled, the screws are violated and the battery is not original. thank me solve the problem

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: this is a really nice phone bought one  earlier for my husband to this one was for my sister and she loves it alot

Reviews.Title: Great smartphone
Reviews.Author: LFN "LFN"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to upgraded from my simple call only cellphone into a smartphone and one that will not lock me into a contract with ATT, my carrier.  This is a great beginner smartphone.  And for those who are wondering what size sim card this uses - it's the mini-sim - a little over half an inch wide and an inch tall!

Reviews.Title: a gift
Reviews.Author: Peter Cruz
Reviews.Content: this phone was a present for someone that lives overseas. and so far he is very happy with it. so I like it.

Reviews.Title: nice but not perfect
Reviews.Author: HUGO E. SANCHEZ
Reviews.Content: very good phone, has certain details but the performance is optimal and has great style. I'll stay a while. nice

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: ARACELIO QUINTANA
Reviews.Content: it a cellular phone that meet what i expect. i can see the videos, pictures clearly, is a nice phone

Reviews.Title: Nice looking , easy to use, lightweight and fast.
Reviews.Author: J. Malaguti "Jacques.M"
Reviews.Content: Very nice and practical basic android phone for the non sophisticated user . Easy to set up, fast response , good camera sharpness . Very good value for money. Only I wished it had a front facing camera for video conference. But for this you have many other Samsung options at a bit higher price.

Reviews.Title: Not exactly what I wanted.  No booklet with user information included so I am having trouble figuring out how to program things.
Reviews.Author: Happy Harper
Reviews.Content: I selected this item because I thought it would be easy to use  - it's not.  I need a teenager to help!

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: The product meets all my expectations and my experience of this purchase is exceptional. It is easier and safer to choose my articles.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone, very pleased recommend
Reviews.Author: Luis Aponte
Reviews.Content: excellent phone, I recommend very satisfied, I get as is as specified, I love this phone very nice, thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Will not charge after 6 weeks. Samsung USA will not honor.
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline
Reviews.Content: I didn't know that the phone is not covered by a Samsung manufacturers warranty.At least not in the USA.  The device says made in China.Samsung support said to maybe try to contact them.That's when I called Amazon.I was worried when the Amazon site stated my return window was finished a week ago.So I contacted Amazon support through the Contact Us page and they extended myreturn for refund window.I am glad for Amazon extending the return window HOWEVERIT was not made clear that there is apparently no usable manufacturers warranty for this device in the USA.Luckily the charging failure was so near the refund window,  I wonder what would have happened another month or so from now.Google "s5830 will not charge" and you will see an unsettling amount of issues with this model not being able to charge.All's well that ends well but it feels like I just dodged a $170 bullet.

Reviews.Title: Good- but be advised its not 3G as it says
Reviews.Author: Private buyer
Reviews.Content: I have had the phone for a week now and it is working well for me. The only problem I have is that it said 3G in the description but it is only 2G, so you have to be in range of an actual wi-fi connection to get any internet or your app store. That is inconvient but otherwise it is fast, slim, and has some nice features. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Not what advertised
Reviews.Author: Armando González Arias
Reviews.Content: The product says it is "Le Fleur White" but it isn't, also says that it is 3G 850Mhz but it isn't. They send me a completely different product.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!
Reviews.Author: ES
Reviews.Content: Its perfect size, same size of my ipod.. i was not looking for one of those big phones that samsung has and this one caught my eye due to the size. Very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Worked perfect for T-Mobile 2G prepaid SIM card
Reviews.Author: SZ
Reviews.Content: It works well with my T-Mobile 2G SIM card.  The only cons I have is the software "[...]" that I downloaded on my PC- It works with the phone sometimes but not stable.

Reviews.Title: cliente satisfecho
Reviews.Author: cliente satisfecho
Reviews.Content: el telefono llego en excelentes condiciones, llego en el tiempo previsto, estoy satisfecha con el producto. me encanta el servicio que prestaron, el producto es exactamente el que describe el vendedor

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: Bought for my daughter that just started high school. Thought with the Samsung name I couldn't go wrong. I was wrong the phone gets absolutely no service, even at the school where every kid has a phone and is on it all day my daughter can't get enough service to even text. Buy an LG and save some money and headaches.

Reviews.Title: Horrible!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Pebbles
Reviews.Content: Firstly the battery power stinks... Everything is in chinese,  and I can't understand and the phone gets too hot when in an active call

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE ROCKS.YOU SHOULD GET IT SAVE ONE FOR ME!:-]:-DIt is pretty,white(i love the color white)you should check it out and make a review about it totally!!!!!!
